Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Unique}
Hi... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi...

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, a birthday present! I love it! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, a birthday present! I love it!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm scared... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm scared...

Entries.DialogueText: I hope the rain doesn't turn my dress green... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope the rain doesn't turn my dress green...

Entries.DialogueText: A birthday present? Oh... I don't like this. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A birthday present? Oh... I don't like this.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you sure? It smells so good! I'll only drink a thimbleful a day. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you sure? It smells so good! I'll only drink a thimbleful a day.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, it's so pretty! And there's a fairy inside? *giggle*... I can hear her singing. She'll be my secret friend. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, it's so pretty! And there's a fairy inside? *giggle*... I can hear her singing. She'll be my secret friend.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, a little dolly! She's kind of dirty, but I'll give her a bath. Thanks! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, a little dolly! She's kind of dirty, but I'll give her a bath. Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I like him! He'll fit right in with my other friends. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I like him! He'll fit right in with my other friends.

Entries.DialogueText: Umm... I'm not supposed to drink this. Isn't it for adults? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Umm... I'm not supposed to drink this. Isn't it for adults?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... Aunt Marnie doesn't let me drink coffee yet... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... Aunt Marnie doesn't let me drink coffee yet...

Entries.DialogueText: I see a crab!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I see a crab!

Entries.DialogueText: I've got sand in my shoe... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've got sand in my shoe...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm collecting seashells... I'm gonna make a necklace!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm collecting seashells... I'm gonna make a necklace!

Entries.DialogueText: Aunt Marnie told me not to get burnt... But when I walk fast, it feels cool, so I think I'll be okay. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aunt Marnie told me not to get burnt... But when I walk fast, it feels cool, so I think I'll be okay.

Entries.DialogueText: Aunt Marnie says I'm not old enough to see a movie by myself... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aunt Marnie says I'm not old enough to see a movie by myself...

Entries.DialogueText: Ew, gross! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ew, gross!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope Shane will still come and see me... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope Shane will still come and see me...

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... I hope I can get married some day. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... I hope I can get married some day.

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Have you ever seen a fairy?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Have you ever seen a fairy?

Entries.DialogueText: Wow! I wanna see one, too. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow! I wanna see one, too.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Me neither. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Me neither.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Is Shane going to be okay? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Is Shane going to be okay?

Entries.DialogueText: I had a nightmare that the house was on fire... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had a nightmare that the house was on fire...

Entries.DialogueText: *giggle* ...look, I've got real bunny-jewel slippers! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *giggle* ...look, I've got real bunny-jewel slippers!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh...Are you looking for Aunt Marnie? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh...Are you looking for Aunt Marnie?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, Mr. {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, Mr. .

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, Ms. {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, Ms. .

Entries.DialogueText: It's fun to live on a farm. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's fun to live on a farm.

Entries.DialogueText: What? *giggle* {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What? *giggle*

Entries.DialogueText: You can play with my dolls if you want to. Just make sure to brush their hair when you're done.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can play with my dolls if you want to. Just make sure to brush their hair when you're done.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Unique}
...Hi. {Portrait:Unique}
Aunt Marnie won't let me go out after 6 o'clock. It's not fair! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aunt Marnie won't let me go out after 6 o'clock. It's not fair!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not afraid of the dark anymore!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not afraid of the dark anymore!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not supposed to talk to strangers... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not supposed to talk to strangers...

Entries.DialogueText: Miss Penny is teaching me how to write in cursive. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Miss Penny is teaching me how to write in cursive.

Entries.DialogueText: She has such pretty handwriting.
Entries.DisplayPattern: She has such pretty handwriting.

Entries.DialogueText: ... I don't know you. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... I don't know you.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you like my bow?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you like my bow?

Entries.DialogueText: I like living on the farm... my favorite is the fresh ice cream from our cows' milk.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like living on the farm... my favorite is the fresh ice cream from our cows' milk.

Entries.DialogueText: You smell like grass. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You smell like grass.

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes I look for crawdads in the river. Don't tell Aunt Marnie... but I fed one to a cow once.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sometimes I look for crawdads in the river. Don't tell Aunt Marnie... but I fed one to a cow once.

Entries.DialogueText: She loved it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: She loved it.

Entries.DialogueText: You're always so nice to me, Mr. {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're always so nice to me, Mr. .

Entries.DialogueText: You're always so nice to me, Ms. {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're always so nice to me, Ms. .

Entries.DialogueText: Grown-ups are usually mean and boring, but you're different.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Grown-ups are usually mean and boring, but you're different.

Entries.DialogueText: Um... d...do you want something? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... d...do you want something?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not supposed to talk to strangers. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not supposed to talk to strangers.

Entries.DialogueText: Shane's gone a lot, and Aunt Marnie is busy all the time... so I have to invent my own games.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shane's gone a lot, and Aunt Marnie is busy all the time... so I have to invent my own games.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm thankful for all my toys. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm thankful for all my toys.

Entries.DialogueText: Did you know Shane's my godfather? He was a friend of my parents. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you know Shane's my godfather? He was a friend of my parents.

Entries.DialogueText: ...they died. *sniff* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...they died. *sniff*

Entries.DialogueText: I loved it! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I loved it!

Entries.DialogueText: Ms. Penny? The cover fell off my math book... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ms. Penny? The cover fell off my math book...

Entries.DialogueText: A natural resource is a material source of wealth that occurs in a natural state and has economic value. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A natural resource is a material source of wealth that occurs in a natural state and has economic value.

Entries.DialogueText: Yesss! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yesss!

Entries.DialogueText: Ew... it smells. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ew... it smells.

Entries.DialogueText: I think Gunther has the key.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think Gunther has the key.

Entries.DialogueText: I saw a big rusty old key fall out of his pocket one time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I saw a big rusty old key fall out of his pocket one time.

Entries.DialogueText: A creepy sewer door like this has just got to be a match for a big rusty old key. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A creepy sewer door like this has just got to be a match for a big rusty old key.

Entries.DialogueText: There's something moving around in there! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's something moving around in there!

Entries.DialogueText: They're too spicy for me! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: They're too spicy for me!

Entries.DialogueText: Um... What do you do with the bugs, Vincent?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... What do you do with the bugs, Vincent?

Entries.DialogueText: *gasp*!
Entries.DisplayPattern: *gasp*!

Entries.DialogueText: That's horrible! No, no, no, no, no... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's horrible! No, no, no, no, no...

Entries.DialogueText: Mr. {Farmer_Name}? Please... put the bugs back in the grass so they can live in peace.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mr. ? Please... put the bugs back in the grass so they can live in peace.

Entries.DialogueText: Miss {Farmer_Name}? Please... put the bugs back in the grass so they can live in peace.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Miss ? Please... put the bugs back in the grass so they can live in peace.

Entries.DialogueText: You learned how to clean the spring onion... without harming any bugs.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You learned how to clean the spring onion... without harming any bugs.

Entries.DialogueText: Spring onions are now worth 5x the gold!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Spring onions are now worth 5x the gold!

Entries.DialogueText: Th... These are real bunny-jewel slippers!! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Th... These are real bunny-jewel slippers!!

Entries.DialogueText: B... But these are so expensive! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: B... But these are so expensive!

Entries.DialogueText: How did you afford them? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: How did you afford them?

Entries.DialogueText: Uncle Shane's in the barn. He said... Uh... He said to tell you he wants to show you something.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Uncle Shane's in the barn. He said... Uh... He said to tell you he wants to show you something.

Entries.DialogueText: White Chicken
Entries.DisplayPattern: White Chicken

Entries.DialogueText: Blue Chicken
Entries.DisplayPattern: Blue Chicken

Entries.DialogueText: Blue Chicken
Entries.DisplayPattern: Blue Chicken

Entries.DialogueText: Blue Chicken
Entries.DisplayPattern: Blue Chicken

Entries.DialogueText: Blue Chicken
Entries.DisplayPattern: Blue Chicken

Entries.DialogueText: Ow! A hen pecked my little finger! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ow! A hen pecked my little finger!

Entries.DialogueText: Mooo! Moooooo! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mooo! Moooooo!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm trying to talk to the baby cows. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm trying to talk to the baby cows.

Entries.DialogueText: But Aunt Marnie! I wanna go in the maze! I'm not scared! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But Aunt Marnie! I wanna go in the maze! I'm not scared!

Entries.DialogueText: Let's go this way!%noturn {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's go this way!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope I can find some eggs before Vincent takes them all... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope I can find some eggs before Vincent takes them all...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to try my best to win this year!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to try my best to win this year!

Entries.DialogueText: Some day, I'm going to be the flower queen!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some day, I'm going to be the flower queen!

Entries.DialogueText: *giggle* Am I doing it right? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *giggle* Am I doing it right?

Entries.DialogueText: Vincent isn't a good dancer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Vincent isn't a good dancer.

Entries.DialogueText: B...But... Do I have to eat it? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: B...But... Do I have to eat it?

Entries.DialogueText: I hope there are babies this year!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope there are babies this year!

Entries.DialogueText: How do the jellies know where to swim if they don't have eyes? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: How do the jellies know where to swim if they don't have eyes?

Entries.DialogueText: Ohh! Presents! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ohh! Presents!

Entries.DialogueText: Is it time to open presents yet? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is it time to open presents yet?

Entries.DialogueText: I wanna give him a carrot nose! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanna give him a carrot nose!

Entries.DialogueText: Don't the fish get cold under there? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't the fish get cold under there?

Entries.DialogueText: *gasp*...Wow!! Thank you! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *gasp*...Wow!! Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: I love presents! Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love presents! Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: Is this a gift? Oh... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is this a gift? Oh...

Entries.DialogueText: Ew. This is icky. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ew. This is icky.

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm really happy to see a movie!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm really happy to see a movie!

Entries.DialogueText: Jas is ecstatic!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Jas is ecstatic!

Entries.DialogueText: That was so much fun! Thanks for bringing me! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was so much fun! Thanks for bringing me!

Entries.DialogueText: This is a grown-up movie, right? I'll be okay!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a grown-up movie, right? I'll be okay!

Entries.DialogueText: Jas is nodding and glancing sideways.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Jas is nodding and glancing sideways.

Entries.DialogueText: I thought it was good! It had... um... good 'die-a-log'! ...right?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I thought it was good! It had... um... good 'die-a-log'! ...right?

Entries.DialogueText: I... I'm not sure I'm allowed to see this... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I... I'm not sure I'm allowed to see this...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm scared... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm scared...

Entries.DialogueText: Jas is trembling.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Jas is trembling.

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff*... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff*...

Entries.DialogueText: This is fun, but I wish I had an ice cream...
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is fun, but I wish I had an ice cream...

Entries.DialogueText: Hi... Um... *giggle*
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi... Um... *giggle*

Entries.DialogueText: Is... Is that for me? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is... Is that for me?

Entries.DialogueText: Wow! This exactly what I wanted... Thank you! You're so nice! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow! This exactly what I wanted... Thank you! You're so nice!
